ClassDef.Name: CoreUIService

Properties.Name: UseUserCard
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the user card (in the upper right hand corner above the leaderboard) is visible.

Properties.Name: UseChat
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the chat box is visible.

Properties.Name: UseHealthBar
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the player's health bar is visible.

Properties.Name: UseLeaderboard
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the player list/leaderboard is visible.

Properties.Name: UseHotbar
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the hot bar is visible.

Properties.Name: UseMenuButton
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the menu button is visible.

Properties.Name: UseEmoteWheel
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the emote wheel is visible.

Properties.Name: CanRespawn
Properties.Description: Determines whether or not the player can respawn.

ClassDef.Description: CoreUI is a static class that allows for the toggling of certain core GUI.
